description: Complete deep cleaning service including all rooms, bathrooms, kitchen, and common areas. Includes dusting, vacuuming, mopping, and sanitizing.
Weekly or bi-weekly house cleaning service to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.
24/7 emergency plumbing services for leaks, clogs, and pipe bursts.
Complete bathroom plumbing installation including fixtures, pipes, and connections.
Basic electrical repairs including outlet installation, switch replacement, and light fixture installation.
